# Number of lines of code in checkPolynomial: 7
sub checkPolynomial {
  my $self = shift;
  my ($l,$r) = ($self->{lop},$self->{rop});
  $self->Error("Subtraction is allowed only between monomials")
    if $r->{isPoly} || ($l->{isPoly} && $l->{isPoly} > 2);
  $self->checkPowers;
}
